data.title: 47 All-Time Funniest Songs To Cheer You Up
data.meta_description: The 47 funniest songs ranged from the 70s, 80s and 90s hits to present pop that will surely bring you positive vibes!
data.text:
There are times when you just need an external force to help you relax or have some me-time. The stress of life sometimes takes a toll, and one just needs a break. Some people retort to vacation, while others prefer listening to the funniest songs.

One of the best things about listening to the best funny songs is that you need not rely on the company of others to uplift your mood. Such songs are meant to get the job done.

Whether it’s bringing a smile on your face or bringing a little joy, keeping a funny song list handy can work wonders for you. But where would you find such a list?

Do not concern yourself with the “where” because, in this write-up, we have gathered some of the funny songs that will make you laugh instantly. The list contains songs from the 1970s to 1990s, and you can expect these songs to radiate great positivity.

You can chill out and relax by picking any of the songs from the list mentioned below. You deserve a little soul-uplifting break from job stress and bring laughter to life. So take it easy and enjoy the funny song list.

47 Funniest Songs To Make You Happier

Get ready to see smile on your lips because things are about to get exciting.

1. Sweat (A La La La La Long) – Inner Circle

You don’t even need to put in the effort to understand this song because merely singing the song along can bring smile to your face. It is one of the funniest songs ever.

I’ve been watching you!

A La La La La Long

A La La La La Long Long

Li Long Long Long.

2. Witch Doctor – Cartoons

If you are checking YouTube for funny songs that will make you laugh, then start with Witch Doctor. You are guranteed to get a little annoyed in funny way.

Ooo eee oo ah ah

Ting tang walla walla bang bang….

3. Wannabe – Spice Girls

Life is confusing and what we really want is what defines our journey. Listen to this song by spice girl and sing along to bring back gusto.

I’ll tell you what I want, what I really really want,

So tell me what you want, what you really really want,

I wanna, I wanna, I wanna, I wanna, I wanna really really really wanna zigazig ha.

4. Dragostea Din Tei – O-Zone

Even when you don’t understand a song, you can still enjoy it. This particular song is a good example of a fun song in foreign sounding language. Listen to it and sing along.

Mai-ia-hii Mai-ia-huu Mai-ia-ha Mai-ia-haha

Mai-ia-hii Mai-ia-huu Mai-ia-ha Mai-ia-haha

5. Boom, Boom, Boom, Boom!! – Vengaboys

Somehow the sound of “BOOM” in the song brings cheer to life.

Boom boom boom boom

I want to do the boom

6. Barbie Girl – Aqua

If you are still scouting for funniest songs, then try listening to this song. It will surely take you into a fantasy land and make you feel relaxed.

7. Friday – Rebecca Black

What day comes to your mind when you think of taking a break? You are right – its Friday! This song has one of the funniest music videos and you would surely enjoy it.

It’s Friday, Friday

Gotta get down on Friday

Everybody’s lookin’ forward to the weekend, weekend

8. U Can’t Touch This – MC Hammer

Feeling a little out of place? Listen to this song if you want to giggle like a baby.

Can’t touch this (oh-oh oh oh oh-oh-oh)

Can’t touch this (oh-oh oh oh oh-oh-oh)

My-my-my-my music…

9. Mambo No. 5 (A Little Bit Of….) – Lou Bega

This one here is one of the best funniest songs ever by Lou Bega. Women are everywhere and having a little bit of every gal can be fun, isn’t it?

A little bit of Monica in my life

A little bit of Erica by my side

A little bit of Rita is all I need

A little bit of Tina is what I see

10 .Call Me Maybe – Carly Ras Jepsen

Alright, so its not funny-funny song, but it surely lightens up to mood. Listen to this song and take it easy!

Hey, I just met you,

And this is crazy,

But here’s my number,

So call me, maybe!

11. Stayin’ Alive – Bee Gees

If you want a song that is fun but also has a lot of energy then try listening to Stayin’ Alive by Bee Gees.

Ah, ha, ha, ha, stayin’ alive, stayin’ alive.

Ah, ha, ha, ha, stayin’ alive.

12. Gonna Make You Sweat (Everybody Dance Now) – C & C Music Factory

If you want just have fun and dance around, then no song can beat the music of this song.

Ev’rybody dance now!

Ev’rybody dance now!

Yeah! Yeah!

Ev’rybody dance now!

Yeah! Yeah! Yeah!

13. I Like to Move It – Real 2 Real

From a two year old kid to a nintey year of grandpa, every one can enjoy this funniest song. It even has one of the funniest music videos in cartoon form from the movie Madagascar!

I like to move it, move it.

I like to move it, move it.

Ya like to… move it.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Aul35gjdFWM

14. Y.M.C.A – Village People

This song can be best enjoyed when you are up for shaking your legs a bit!

It’s fun to stay at the Y.M.C.A.

It’s fun to stay at the Y.M.C.A.

15. Tunak Tunak Tun – Daler Mehndi

Yes, we’re in love with the foreign language. Do you know that Tunak Tunak Tun actually means dear / beloved? It’s a Bhangra Pop song.

This song should definately be a part of your funny songs list.

Tunak tunak tun, tunak tunak tun, tunak tunak tun, da da da

Tunak tunak tun, tunak tunak tun, tunak tunak tun, da da da

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vTIIMJ9tUc8

16. Lemon Tree – Fools Garden

This song is funny but in a sad kind of way…

I’m sitting here in a boring room, it’s just another rainy

Sunday afternoon. I’m wasting my time, I got nothing to do.

I’m hanging around, I’m waiting for you,

But nothing ever happens – and I wonder.

17. Macarena – Los Del Rio

Who doesn’t enjoy the gibberish of a foreign language. It doesn’t matter if you understand the song or not, just listen to Macarena and bring on your Mojo!

When you try to sing along you will find out that it is surely one of the funniest songs ever.

It’s actually a pretty funny song about the girl Macarena wanting to meet a boyfriend in the States!

Dale a tu cuerpo alegría Macarena…..

¡Eh,… Macarena! Aaay!

18. Gangnam Style – PSY

This song was kind of a revolution and was played almost everywhere in the world in the 1990s. If you are making a list of best funniest songs, then don’t forget to include “Gangnam Style” in it.

Op, op, op, op Oppa Gangnam Style

Gangnam Style

19. Funky Town – Lipps Inc.

Bring back your energetic vibes by listening to one of the funniest songs ever.

Well, I talk about it, talk about it

Talk about it, talk about it Talk about, talk about

Talk about movin’

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GnodEEnMvC8

20. #SELFIE – The Chainsmokers

If you are a selfie aficionado, then this song will surely keep you hooked.

After we go to the bathroom, can we go smoke a cigarette?

I really need one

But first, Let me take a selfie

21. Lollipop – Mika

For those of you looking for funny songs that will make you laugh, should definately listen to Lollipop by Mika.

Sucking too hard on your lollipop,

Or love’s gonna get you down

22. The Lazy Song – Bruno Mars

If you are desperately in a need for a break, then try listening to this song. It will surely relax you!

Today I don’t feel like doing anything

I just wanna lay in my bed

23. Hot N Cold – Katy Perry (and the Chipettes version’s even better)

The Chippete verison and Katy Perry version are equally engaging. If you are scouting for funniest music videos, then you won’t be disappointed.

You’re up then you’re down You’re wrong when it’s right It’s black and it’s white

We fight, we break up We kiss, we make up

24. Dub-I-Dub – Me & My

Just forget all your worries and “dub-i-dub”. It is one of the funniest songs every that will get you hooked to its lyrics in no time.

Dub-i-dub-i-dub-i-dub-dub-dub Dub-i-dub-i-dub-i-yeah-yeah

Dub-i-dub-i-dub-i-dub-dub-dub I don’t need your love

25. Girls Just Wanna Have Fun – Cyndi Lauper

Why not? Every girl deserves to enjoy and have fun in their lives. If you want to listent to the funny songs that will make you laugh, then include this song in your funny songs list.

Oh daddy dear you know you’re still number one

But girls they want to have fun Oh girls just want to have

26. We No Speak Americano – Yolanda Be Cool, DCup

Just sing along and shake your head with pa pa l’ americano.

Pa pa l’ americano

Pa pa l’ americano

Pa pa l’ americano

27. Livin’ La Vida Loca – Ricky Martin

When the world non-sense has crazed you out, listen to this fun song. It will definately bring back some of your fun memories.

Upside, inside out she’s livin la vida loca

She’ll push and pull you down, livin la vida loca

28. Dancing Lasha Tumbai – VERKA SERDUCHKA

Another foreign language fun song that can make you sync your lips and get you hooked to it.

Sieben, Sieben, ai lyu lyu Sieben, Sieben, ein, zwei…

ein, zwei, drei

29. My First Kiss – 3oh3! feat. Ke$ha

Looking for some memorable and happpy moments? Why not recall your first kiss with this song?

My first kiss went a little like this

[muach] and twist [muach muach] and twist

30. We Will Rock You – Queen

If you want to bring back your energetic charm back, then listening to this fun song in full volume.

We will we will rock you

We will we will rock you

31. Uptown Funk – Mark Ronson & Bruno Mars

Bruno Mars and Mark Ronson’s componsition is just awesome here, Hardly anyone can resist the beat of this song. It is one of the funniest song that you need to put in your list.

I’m too hot (hot damn)

Call the po-lice and the fireman

32. Summer Nights – Olivia Newton-John, John Travolta (soundtrack from Grease)

Sountracks fro Grease are evergreen and this particular melody is surely soul uplifting.

Tell me more, tell me more How much dough did he spend?

Tell me more, tell me more Could she get me a friend?

33. Rude – MAGIC!

This one is a must-include song in your funny songs list. It is one of the best funniest songs with one of the most funniest music videos. Listen and watch!

Why you gotta be so rude? Don’t you know I’m human too? Why you gotta be so rude?

I’m gonna marry her anyway

34. We Like To Party! – Vengaboys

Who doesn’t like to party like Vengaboys? No body can party as good as they do. It is must-listen funny song.

We like to party

We like, we like to party…. We like to party

35. Beat It – Michael Jackson

Here is a funny song by the legendary Michael Jackson. It is about beating up the other, and it’s kind of funny.

Showin’ how funky strong is your fight

It doesn’t matter who’s wrong or right

Just beat it, beat it

36. Sexy And I Know It – LMFAO

Improve your self-image with this song. You are sexy and you know it too! Lol!

Girl look at that body

Girl look at that body

I work out I’m sexy and I know it

37. Waka Waka – Shakira

One cannot stop repeating the lyrics after listening to this song. One of the best and funniest songs by Shakira!

Tsamina mina, eh eh Waka waka, eh eh

Tsamina mina zangalewa

This time for Africa

38. Pump It – The Black Eyed Peas

If you want to take a break in a fun way then listen to this song and repeat the lyrics to get into a trance.

Pump it (louder)

Pump it (louder)

Pump it (louder)

…..

39. Hooked on a Feeling – Blue Swede

Another song with funny gibberish lyrics that will keep you hooked for long. It is one of the funniest song that you must include in your playlist.

Ooga-chaka Ooga-Ooga

Ooga-chaka Ooga-Ooga

….

40. Grace Kelly – Mika

If you want to listen to a fun song that helps you improve your self-image, then this one a no-misser!

I could be brown I could be blue I could be violet sky

I could be hurtful I could be purple I could be anything you like

41. Don’t Stop Me Now – Queen

Do not let others bring you down or stop you from having the fun you deserve. That’s what this song is all about!

Don’t stop me now I’m having such a good time

I’m having a ball

Don’t stop me now

If you wanna have a good time just give me a call

42. Money Money Money – Abba

Sarcastically funny song about how money controls our lives.

I work all night, I work all day, to pay the bills I have to pay Ain’t it sad

And still there never seems to be a single penny left for me That’s too bad

43. Beauty School Drop Out – Frankie Avalon (soundtrack from Grease)

This is another beaut from Grease, that talks about motivating a girl. It is also fun to listen to it.

Beauty school dropout, No graduation day for you.

Beauty school dropout, Missed your midterms and flunked shampoo!

44. Ice Ice Baby – Vanilla Ice

If you are old-school, then this song will surely bring back some fun memories.

Ice ice baby, Vanilla

Ice ice baby, Vanilla

45. You Can’t Roller Skate In A Buffalo Herd – Roger Miller

If you love skating, you would surely love this song.

Ya can’t roller skate in a buffalo herd But you can be happy if you’ve a mind to

Ya can’t take a shower in a parakeet cage But you can be happy if you’ve a mind to

46. YOLO – The Lonely Island, Adam Levine, Kendrick Lamar

#YOLO, the funniest part of the song is that it tells people to live the moment.

Never go to loud clubs ‘Cause it’s bad for your ears.

Your friends will all be sorry When they can’t hear.

47. Axel F – Crazy Frog

This song has one of the funniest music videos and the lyrics are funny too.

Listen to the complete playlist here on Spotify:

Conclusion

Life can be tough sometimes, and there is not much one can do in such instances. However, one mustn’t take life too seriously because life itself is not permanent. So, how can the worries be permanent? Listen to the list of these funniest songs and have a little fun in life.
